headline: This week’s covers

children.data: the world we have a cover contemplating how to avoid a superpower conflict. Tensions between America and China in relation to Taiwan make war a distinct possibility.
How to avoid war over Taiwan
America and China are preparing for a war over Taiwan

In Britain we consider an unpleasant question rather closer to home: what to do about the country’s woeful life expectancy? In the past decade hundreds of thousands of people have died earlier than might have been expected.
Britain has endured a decade of early deaths. Why?
Life expectancy in Britain has flatlined in the last ten years
For subscribers only: to see how we design each week’s cover, sign up to our weekly

bodyText:
IN MOST OF the world we have a cover contemplating how to avoid a superpower conflict. Tensions between America and China in relation to Taiwan make war a distinct possibility.

Leader: How to avoid war over Taiwan
Briefing: America and China are preparing for a war over Taiwan
Special report: Frontline Formosa
In Britain we consider an unpleasant question rather closer to home: what to do about the country’s woeful life expectancy? In the past decade hundreds of thousands of people have died earlier than might have been expected. 

Leader: Britain has endured a decade of early deaths. Why?
Britain: Life expectancy in Britain has flatlined in the last ten years
For subscribers only: to see how we design each week’s cover, sign up to our weekly Cover Story newsletter.

parts.description: Higher interest rates are not sufficiently slowing global growth

parts.headline: Strikes at home and war in Ukraine test the French president
parts.description: It is a critical moment for Emmanuel Macron

parts.headline: American universities are pursuing fairness the wrong way
Letters to the editor
parts.subheadline: On medical research, fertility in the OECD, soldiers’ mental health, energy firms, the car

_metadata.articleBody:
IN MOST OF the world we have a cover contemplating how to avoid a superpower conflict. Tensions between America and China in relation to Taiwan make war a distinct possibility.

Leader: How to avoid war over Taiwan
Briefing: America and China are preparing for a war over Taiwan
Special report: Frontline Formosa
In Britain we consider an unpleasant question rather closer to home: what to do about the country’s woeful life expectancy? In the past decade hundreds of thousands of people have died earlier than might have been expected. 

Leader: Britain has endured a decade of early deaths. Why?
Britain: Life expectancy in Britain has flatlined in the last ten years
For subscribers only: to see how we design each week’s cover, sign up to our weekly Cover Story newsletter.
